init: class Python { private lateinit var _python: SharedInterpreter; private val executor = Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor(); fun exec(code: String) = executor.submit { python.exec(code) }.get().let { Unit }; operator fun get(name: String) = executor.submit(Callable<Any> { python.getValue(name) }).get(); operator fun set(name: String, value: Any) = executor.submit { python.set(name, value) }.get(); private val python: SharedInterpreter get() { if (!this::_python.isInitialized) _python  = SharedInterpreter(); return _python }; operator fun invoke(code: String) = exec(code) }
